name: Tooth Fairy Salon: Makeover!
description:
Fancy fashion and cosmetics? Change your clothes and make up in this manicure and makeover salon for tonight's party!

Play with our pretty tooth fairy in the best magic makeup salon ever! Enjoy having a great facial care and a new good looking style changing your appearance with a pretty makeover!
Makeup, lipsticks, eye shadows, rouges, mascaras, manicure... Everything you can imagine about cosmetics you will find it in this game for girls for free! Change now your style and dress up with a new makeover in our magic tooth fairy girls game! Enhance your beauty and look totally awesome with our makeup salon!

TOOTH FAIRY MAKEUP SALON MAGIC BEAUTY MAKEOVER:
- Wellness salon: Relax in the spa with nice massage lotions in this free game for girls!
- Fashion and Style: Dress up and follow our beauty tips in the magic world of tooth fairy!
- Facial care: Repair the beautiful face of our tooth fairy in the magic beauty spa!
- Makeover and makeup salon: Look gorgeous with different cosmetics!
- Manicure: Make your nails look pretty!

Have fun in our wellness spa and makeup salon with our tooth fairy in this game for girls for free full of fun! Make our tooth fairy go through the whole beauty process: Try the makeup that fits best to her, choose a cool outfit and manicure and get her ready to become the most stylish girl!
Challenge yourself to enhance the beauty of tooth fairy in our magic makeup salon and prepare her for tonight's party!
